responses: Sure, How may I assist you?
Sure! Tell me what you want.
VIT stands for Vellore Institute of Technology. It has 4 branches in Vellore, Bhopal, Chennai and Amravati. You can know more about VIT through its official site: https://vit.ac.in/

patterns: Which site is used by VIT students for accessing study materials?
Where can I find my attendance and grades?
Which portal do VIT students use for academics?
What is the link to the VTOP portal?
Where can I log in to VTOP?
responses: VIT students use the VTOP portal for all academic activities such as attendance, grades, and study materials. For Vellore campus, you can log in here: https://vtop.vit.ac.in/vtop/login üîó
